about_the_game:
In The Shadows Original Soundtrack, composed by LOMBUS, featuring 20 beautiful original tracks from the game.

Available in MP3 320 kbps format

Track listing :

1. It's Getting Darker 02:52
2. Where Should I Start 05:20
3. Looking Forward To Anything 03:50
4. Synesthesia 06:16
5. Deeper 05:00
6. Waiting For Something To Happen 01:45
7. Memories Warm You Up Inside 04:28
8. They Get Scared In The Light 06:45
9. There Is An Order To Everything 01:53
10. I Don't Want To Remember 02:42
11. Taking Control Of My Fears 02:41
12. Ascending 03:40
13. Waking Up At Night 03:18
14. Challenges Ahead 05:36
15. Intermission 02:56
16. This Is Now 02:40
17. Peaceful 04:32
18. Discovery 03:11
19. I Remember This Song 01:48
20. To The Stars 05:12
